title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 26
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for May 26
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Nutanix (NTNX). Nutanix Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest daily gain this year after fiscal third-quarter results were well received. The provider of Internet-based business computing systems had a narrower loss and higher revenue than analysts expected, based on a Bloomberg survey. Nutanix's fourth-qurater forecasts also exceeded projections.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
